title: True Ice Zac
body:
My conceptual idea for a Zac Skin

Since there seems to have been no new released  {{champion:154}}  skins I will put this forth to the friendly community of League of Legends Oceania.

The Base:
The base body idea is that Zac will be made of unstable True Ice, similar of colour and nature to that of {{champion:127}}. This means that some of his body would be flowing and shifting from time to time similar to Lissandra's movement animation of her legs; imagine Default Zac's idle animations where he flexes his body but this time he's made of shifting True Ice. The head will be largely static during idle and movement but not for abilities. 
The eye sockets will be hollow, glowing light blue similar to the colour of Default (Skin) {{champion:34}}. He would still have his "hairstyle" but it would taper from the base of his brow to a sharp tip and maybe veer off to the back. It would be idle during movement and idle.
His idle animations will still have him flexing his mass.
His movement animations will have tiny minuscule shards of True Ice falling mainly from his leg or feet.
His voice could be reverberated or echoed like Lissandra's.

____

* Passive:
Shards of True Ice fall and pierce the ground. These shards will always be trembling and shaking; full of energy; seemingly unstable.
During his revival animation, the shards shakily and tremblingly merge to the main body which would be a spiky trembling mass of True Ice, similar to Lissandra's ultimate except more sporadic and having more sharp spikes.

* Q:
His arms become gigantic sharp but thick lances that stab enemies. It could also gradually brighten slightly from his body to its tip.

* W:
His mass explodes sending minuscule shards of True Ice around him.

* E:
His body generates extra mass of True Ice elongating his body similar to his current animation. Upon launching his shoulders and upper body visually become very rugged, stony, full of small protruding spikes. 

* R:
The True Ice releases its compressed and unstable form becoming a leaping sphere of shattering and bursting lances of Ice.

His whole nature would be unstable, shaky and kind of magnetic. Note: This is simply a basic conceptual and probably unfinished idea that might not cover all aspects of Zac. Feel free to judge and put forth your own ideas.
